content: While perfect dodging, you will recover a small amount of stamina with this Curios equipped. Compared to most of the others, this one is particularly situational and unlikely to be as helpful for most ers compared to many of the other Curios items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Glazed_Reliquary.md', within the main section titled 'Glazed Reliquary'.
The content is as follows:
While perfect dodging, you will recover a small amount of stamina with this Curios equipped. Compared to most of the others, this one is particularly situational and unlikely to be as helpful for most ers compared to many of the other Curios items.
